1.0.1: Added a "coloring" system where you can choose between different colors from ingame. This can be customized alot.
1.0.2: Remade the coloring UI to look like ox_lib a little.
1.0.3: Fixed where you could only add 1 zone
1.0.4: Added so can choose what stuff should hide onEnter.
1.0.5: Added a "anti RDM" thing. When you enter the zone you cannot see people outside, only people inside. This makes it so you can't RDM at all.
1.0.6: Non essential update if you don't use ox_inventory.
1.0.7: Added discord logs for killstreaks (increment of 5).
Fixed an issue where the person would not get the weapon configured
Added a anti-vehicle feature when you enter the zone
